timeline.message: Use a simple date format for transaction timestamp

Use ContraintLayout for transaction_row

Primary status is limited to 1 line ending with ...

timeline.bodyText: I changed to ConstraintLayout because I couldn't figure out how to make the primary status text end in ... while keeping the secondary text from getting cropped or overlapped.
